name: Duped (itch)
description:
Duped is a game where you play as a square. You begin in a cave, cold and alone. Find your way up. Find your way out. Find yourselves.

A 2D action/puzzle platformer where you create and interact with clones to solve puzzles and escape. You'll face off against a series of increasingly difficult puzzles, with only yourselves, physics and your wits. Create clones in order to make your way to the exit for each level. But, think carefully, because only one clone can make it to the next level.
